articles.title: ‘France must leave EU!' - Europe on brink of political and social meltdown - Yellow Vests - Daily Express

articles.title: Vaccine success puts Britain on top for foreign investment - The Times
articles.description: Britain is the most attractive destination in Europe for foreign investors and gained more last year than any country except France, according to a report.The UK drew in 975 new projects last year
